page.title: 17THE LANDSCAPE OF DUNS & AREA
page.content: MOST OF OUR AREA IS RURAL,WITH QUITE A BIT OF URBAN SPREAD THROUGHOUT.MUCH OF THE RURAL LANDSCAPE IS OPEN COUNTRY USED FOR ARABLE & LIVESTOCK.WOODLAND IS MAINLY DECIDUOUS.THE LITTLE WATER THERE IS,IS MAINLY MARSH.THE LAND IS GENTLY UNDULATING &LOW WITH FEW HILLS. THE RURAL ROADS ARE NARROW & NOT VERY GOOD.IN DUNS ITSELF,THE ROADS & STREETS WERE ONCE COBBLED BUT ARE NOW TARRED.THE SQUARE IS BUSY AS IT HAS MOST OF THE SHOPS.THERE IS A VARIETY OF HOUSING IN DUNS.IN THE OLD PART OF THE TOWN,THE HOUSES ARE BUILT OUT OF STONE &SLATE &ARE BUILT TO THEIR OWN DESIGN,WHEREAS THE MORE MODERN HOUSING ESTATES ARE BRICK &TILED ROOFS &BUILT TO THE SAME DESIGN.THERE IS A PARK IN THE MIDDLE OF DUNS &SEVERAL PLAYING FIELDS SO THAT THE URBAN LANDSCAPE SEEMS TO MERGE WITH THE RURAL LANDSCAPE.
